description: This Java source file defines a custom exception class 'EntityNotFoundException' used to indicate that a requested entity was not found in the database, extending the 'SimpleBankingGlobalException' class. It provides constructors to create instances with default or custom messages.

classes.name: EntityNotFoundException
classes.description: A custom exception class used to indicate that an entity was not found in the database, extending the global exception hierarchy.

methods.name: EntityNotFoundException()
methods.description: Default constructor that initializes the exception with a standard error message and error code.

methods.name: EntityNotFoundException(String message)
methods.description: Constructor that initializes the exception with a custom message and a standard error code.
